Headline: #22 Clark Temporary Northbound Reroute near Dearborn/Walton
ShortDescription: Northbound 22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Chicago, LaSalle, Division, and Clark due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #22 Clark buses are temporarily rerouted via Dearborn, Chicago, LaSalle, Division, and Clark due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #70 Division Temporary Eastbound Reroute near Dearborn/Walton
ShortDescription: Eastbound 70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, and Clark (Layover) due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Eastbound #70 Division buses are temporarily rerouted via Division, Dearborn, Oak, and Clark (Layover) due to street blockage near Dearborn/Walton.

Westbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: O'Hare-bound Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Illinois Medical Dist. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
O'Hare-bound Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays following an earlier door problem at Illinois Medical District.

Some trains and platforms may be busier than usual as crews work to restore normal service.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.
